name: Akhand Pratap Tiwari
intro: My name is Akhand Pratap Tiwari. Currently I am Pursuing B.Tech. 3rd year (CSE) at VIT Bhopal.
I am particularly interested in AI and how actual Mathematics works under the hood to make AI work.
I also like to design and build UX/UI primarily for easier interation with AI models. I also like to make graphs (as in Maths using equations).
hobbies: I love making Graphs and Art.
I also like to write stories.
And most favourite, disassembling concepts, ideas and tech to see how they work.
services: Designing (in Figma) and implementing (in Flutter) UI and UX
